resources.string: Welcome to Mike\'s Mach Bikes! Browse through our catalog and order yourself a brand new bike, tailored and delivered, just for you

- 54 Cm Light Aluminum Frame more light for your cycling. 
 - 16 Speed Shifting system ensure you to brakes for safety at any speed. 
 - Double wall Aluminum Rims makes it more fashion. 
 - Due to bicycle are overweight products,if there are any damages caused during the shipping,please contact us directly for solve the problems.
 - Bicycle Serials number at the bottom tube or head tube of frame, please find it and make a note ,if the bicycle was stolen, you can provide it to the police. 
 - This is sole signs that distinguishes the same serials products.If there any questions,please contact us directly for assistance.

- 21 Speed Shimano Shifting system ensure you to brakes for safety at any speed.
 - Please rotate the fork 180 degree before assemble front wheel, make sure the front brake and the rear brake at same side of the bike.
 - If the brake installed incorrect, the brake and gear system can not works.
 - Dual Disc brake provided great stopping power.
 - Bicycle Serials number at the bottom tube or head tube of frame, please find it and make a note ,if the bicycle was stolen, you can provide it to the police. 
 - This is sole signs that distinguishes the same serials products. 
 - If there any questions,please contact us directly for assistance. 
 - Due to bicycle are overweight products,if there are any damages caused during the shipping,please contact us directly for solve the problems.

- Lightweight hand-built classic diamond steel frame design with an upright riding position designed for urban commuting, leisurely riding, and exercise - Equipped with Shimano 7-Speed drivetrain and RevoShift twist shifters for ultimate precision, speed, and control. 
 - Front and rear Linear Pull brakes to keep you safe and in control of your ride at all times. 
 - Kenda 700x35C tires grip the ground for a smooth and sure footed ride every time. 
 - Arrives 85-Percent built and comes with assembly tools and instructions so you can easily finish putting together your bike.
